languages.text: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's non-attack psychic powers cost −1 AP less during the wearer's first turn in combat.

languages.text: Во время первого за бой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа его неатакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
languages.original_text: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж игнорирует первую направленную на него психосилу противника.
Персонаж игнорирует первую направленную на него психосилу противника.

languages.text: 装备者在每场战斗的首个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，所有非攻击性的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能力量{/g}耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 装备者在每场战斗的首个回合中，所有非攻击性的灵能力量耗费的行动点数降低1点。

languages.text: 戦闘中の使用者の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、使用者の攻撃以外の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を−1減少させる。
languages.original_text: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、着用者の最初のターンで攻撃ではない超能力に対するコストが−1AP減る。

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} que no sean de ataque cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador en combate.
languages.original_text: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: El primer poder psíquico del enemigo que tenga como objetivo al portador no le afecta.

languages.text: Die nicht-angreifenden {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} des Trägers kosten während des ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers im Kampf −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} non offensifs de l'utilisateur coûtent 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins lors de son premier {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de combat.

languages.text: Takan kişinin saldırı dışı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, takan kişinin çatışmadaki ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
